data.text: @DanniRowson @ColostomyUK @Coloplast_UK @Charter_UK @MeetAnOstoMate @iasupport @Comfizz Awww hon. I will keep you in my thoughts. If things get too bad please talk to your Doctor. 🙏🦋💜
@EPower75241250 @ColostomyUK @Coloplast_UK @Charter_UK @MeetAnOstoMate @iasupport @Comfizz Thank you I really hope so. I’m starting to struggle a bit now 😔
@DanniRowson @ColostomyUK @Coloplast_UK @Charter_UK @MeetAnOstoMate @iasupport @Comfizz Hope you start to feel better soon 🤗
@DanniRowson @ColostomyUK @Coloplast_UK @Charter_UK @MeetAnOstoMate @iasupport @Comfizz I hope that Covid leaves you soon. 🙏💜🦋

@DanniRowson @ColostomyUK @Coloplast_UK @Charter_UK @MeetAnOstoMate @iasupport @Comfizz Yes it's a strange illnes have had symptoms for months even in hospital with phenomia but kept testing negative and still not same

@royburrage1 @ColostomyUK @Coloplast_UK @Charter_UK @MeetAnOstoMate @iasupport @Comfizz Thank you! I wasn’t expecting to be this unwell with it to be honest but it just goes to show that everybody is different when having Covid!
@DanniRowson @ColostomyUK @Coloplast_UK @Charter_UK @MeetAnOstoMate @iasupport @Comfizz Hope you get to feeling better soon
@JenevaSaurus11 @ColostomyUK @Coloplast_UK @Charter_UK @MeetAnOstoMate @iasupport @Comfizz Thank you! My little boy is doing fine ❤️

@DanniRowson @ColostomyUK @Coloplast_UK @Charter_UK @MeetAnOstoMate @iasupport @Comfizz Oh no, Friend! Thinking healing thoughts for you and that lil' guy. So sorry to hear you're sick! Take care of you. 💚
